title: Typography St Petersburg
content:
I just got back from St. Petersburg and have posted all my pics from the trip on Flickr. Here is a sampling below. Or view the full _**[St Petersburg Typography set](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201075647/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/joepemberton/sets/72157607457356122/)**_.

[![CCCP](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201075647im_/http:/farm4.static.flickr.com/3093/2886310048_cb90162fc7.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201075647/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/joepemberton/2886310048/ "CCCP by Joe Pemberton, on Flickr")  
CCCP

[![Russian design student exhibition](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201075647im_/http:/farm4.static.flickr.com/3049/2872425804_e718ee3fac.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201075647/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/joepemberton/2872425804/ "Russian design student exhibition by Joe Pemberton, on Flickr")  
ATypI and TDC Design Exhibition
